sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Customer_Dynamics_AX_Number__c = '#[payload."Customer Number"]'

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { (flowVars.rowData filter (payload01.Id == $.Id or payload01.Category__c == $."Categories Affected" or payload01.Category__c != $."Categories Excluded" or payload01.Product_c == $."Specific item affected" or payload01.Product_c == $."Specific item excluded" ) map ((payload02 , indexOfPayload00) -> { Id: payload01.Id, IsDeleted: payload01.IsDeleted, Name: payload01.Name, CreatedDate: payload01.CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate: payload01.LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp:
